  • Method Details

    • createProfile

      boolean createProfile(GymCustomer customer)
      Create a new customer profile.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer object containing profile details.
      Returns:
      true if the profile is created successfully, false otherwise.

    • editProfile

      boolean editProfile(GymCustomer customer)
      Edit an existing customer profile.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer object with updated profile details.
      Returns:
      true if the profile is edited successfully, false otherwise.

    • createBooking

      int createBooking(int customerId, int slotid, int centerId, Date date)
      Create a new booking for a customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer making the booking.
      slotid - The ID of the slot being booked.
      centerId - The ID of the gym center.
      date - The date of the booking.
      Returns:
      The booking ID if the booking is created successfully.

    • viewBookings

      List<GymBooking> viewBookings(int customerId)
      View a list of bookings made by a customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer whose bookings are being viewed.
      Returns:
      A list of bookings associated with the given customer ID.

    • cancelBooking

      boolean cancelBooking(int customerId, int bookingId)
      Cancel a booking made by a customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer canceling the booking.
      bookingId - The ID of the booking being canceled.
      Returns:
      true if the booking is canceled successfully, false otherwise.

    • makepayment

      int makepayment(int bookingId, String mode)
      Make a payment for a booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking for which the payment is being made.
      mode - The mode of payment (e.g., credit card, PayPal).
      Returns:
      The payment ID if the payment is successful.

    • updatepwd

      boolean updatepwd(String email, String password, String role)
      Update the password of a customer.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address associated with the customer account.
      password - The new password.
      role - The role of the user (e.g., "customer").
      Returns:
      true if the password is updated successfully, false otherwise.
